channel.title: Traveling on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Traveling on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Single-Serving Friends
item.description: Edward Norton’s character in _Fight Club _introduced me to the term “single-serving friend,” a person who is your friend for a short period in time. In the movie, he’s talking about the people he meets on flights (“everything on a plane is single-serving”).
